name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Luoyang residents protested in a movie theater, holding signs that read "Li Bai and Du Fu met in Luoyang", "The sun and the moon shine together, and epics meet in Luoyang", and "Resolutely safeguard correct history".
The reason is that a movie "30,000 Miles in Chang'an" was released recently, which mainly tells the story of Li Bai, Gao Shi, Du Fu and others meeting and meeting in the Tang Dynasty and the subsequent stories. However, when the movie was released in Luoyang, Luoyang residents believed that the plot of the movie did not match the actual history and that these stories should have happened in Luoyang.

content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of July 26, a large number of elderly people protested in front of the government gate of Qiaoxi District, Zhangjiakou City.
It was learned on the spot that it was about housing and treatment issues. The masses repeatedly complained that the government would not solve them. Filming was not allowed on the spot. A leader was on the scene to persuade them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Under a video about the Battle of Menglianggu
Netizens expressed their condolences to the Kuomintang's 74th Division
The Battle of Menglianggu was a major battle in the Yimeng Mountain area in central Shandong Province during the Second Kuomintang-Communist Civil War in May 1947. The East China Field Army of the People's Liberation Army commanded by Chen Yi and Su Yu won the battle, and the reorganized 74th Division of the elite "Ace Model Division" commanded by Zhang Lingfu was completely wiped out, and the division commander Zhang Lingfu died.

Netizen submission
On July 25, the media reported that a man was deceived into working as a "slave" in an Australian factory, working 7 days a week, 12 hours a day, and earning 24 yuan per hour.
As a result, the comment area was flooded with netizens exclaiming "It's higher than my salary" and "9 yuan an hour, what am I?"
